title: Native desktop - memory, storage, processing and aspect ratio
mainAdvice: Answer the following questions about your desktop based Solution
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.

minimum-memory-requirement.mainAdvice: Select the minimum memory requirement for your Solution to function?
minimum-memory-requirement.additionalAdvice: Please select below the minimum memory requirement.

errorResponse.required: Minimum memory requirement is a mandatory question

storage-requirements-description.additionalAdvice: Add further information about the storage requirements needed for your Solution to function.

errorResponse.required: Storage requirement description is a mandatory question
errorResponse.maxLength: Storage requirement description is over the character limit

minimum-cpu.additionalAdvice: Add further information about the minimum CPU power required for your Solution to function.

errorResponse.required: Minimum necessary CPU power is a mandatory question
errorResponse.maxLength: Minimum necessary CPU power is over the character limit

recommended-resolution.mainAdvice: What is the recommended desktop aspect ratio and screen resolution? (optional)
recommended-resolution.additionalAdvice: Please select below the minimum resolution required for your Solution to function on desktop.
